text: Evarkalukku nam (munnar) vetattai alittomo, avarkal (napiye!) Um mitu irakkappatta (ivvetat)taip parri makilvarkal; eninum itan cila pakutikalai marukkiravarkalum (avarkalutaiya) kuttatil evappattiruppatellam, allah - (oruvanaiye) vananka ventum; avanukku (etanaiyum, evaraiyum) inaivaikkak kutatu enpatu tan; nan (unkalai) avan pakkame alaikkinren; avan pale (en) mitciyum irukkiratu" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
